overview: The second film in The Galilean Satellites series which explores the terrain of Jupiter's moon Io. The soundtrack consists of recordings made by several probes that visited Io and reveals its ionosphere. The sounds are stretched and warped, along with the substances that are being filmed, to highlight Io's active techtonic life. It is the most techtonically active body in our solar system.
title: The Galilean Satellites- Io
